name: wafer
description: GPU development stack that lives inside your IDE, providing profiling, compiler explorer, and GPU docs in one place. Integrates GPU tooling directly into the editor.
community_quotes: A definite must-have for custom kernels developers
Solving the Context Switching Tax which is particularly brutal in GPU programming
Interesting choice to frame Wafer as an IDE-native GPU dev stack

name: Mistral Vibe CLI
description: Open-source command-line AI coding agent with repository awareness. Powered by Mistral's Devstral 2 models, it can explore, modify, and run code in local codebases directly from the terminal.

name: Dropstone
description: The Recursive Swarm IDE - orchestrates 10,000 AI agents in a single development tab. Represents a shift from chatbot-based interfaces to swarm orchestration.
community_quotes: The end of the chatbot era

name: BrowserBook
description: Browser Automation IDE with AI-powered capabilities. Features a Jupyter-style TypeScript notebook interface with inline browser integration for deterministic web automations.

name: devlo
description: Platform to build, edit and ship software in one place with AI. Preview live changes, deploy with a click, convert tickets to PRs, and get code reviews.
community_quotes: Ties building, editing and shipping software together so naturally
Live previews and one-click deploys genuinely reduce stress
Lets non-technical teammates make visual edits and send PRs
